title: Umm we are stuck in pre game lobby
body: just started a game it was about to start and its bugged out or something and we are frozen in the lobby I tried to logout and back in and im stuck at the reconnect to game screen when I click on reconnect nothing happens it's just like frozen

replies.body: I love how there is one mega butthurt guy on here like pls just wait out brah, chill.
Agreed.
you guys still stuck? reconnect wont go away for me T_T

> [{quoted}](name=Skillz that Kill,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kA8GNr9f,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-21T23:16:19.366+0000)
>
> you guys still stuck? reconnect wont go away for me T_T

Yep, still stuck
still stuck, any announcement from Riot on their broken game?!
it is back on now
Just joined last game. The split second I came into game, my Nexus exploded...
I just got flamed for losing a game where half my team joined 20 minutes in, and the funny thing is, they lose nothing from it :')
nothing to do with us,  it's Riot's 2003 software

I think you should stop blaming 'Riot' as a whole for small issues on OCE. 'Riot' as a whole shouldn't be blamed...and as I said, with any company regardless gaming related there will be issues. Will you die if you don't have a game of Blind Pick right now? Be patient...
How can you honestly defend Riot's horrendous client?
I am not defending anyone. I am simply stating that everywhere things go wrong and not everything runs smoothly...happens on many other games.
I played WoW and many other games for 10+ years and I never had the CONSTANT issues I have with this game. Why is that?
OCE is a really bad server....others are mostly fine. Player base in OCE isn't as big as others, which is why we don't get more game modes unlike other larger servers.
Not a big player base may also be the answer to your question about issues...smaller base = less investment.

I said player base. League has huge player bases on other servers, with OCE very small in size compared to them. That leads to less sources in OCE. So yes, OCE isn't really prioritized as much as other servers due to lower amounts of players.
Well that's disgraceful. I'd like to hear Riot officially come out and say we are second class citizens compared to NA/EU. Would love that.

you do know that OCE has only one team of riot workers based in Australia who try to keep up with the performance and demands of the game but are struggling because they don't have enough workers? Currently OCE is at it's baby stage. I wouldn't go as far as saying second class (but i understand how you feel) but it's the fact that the other servers are way bigger and had similar issues when they were starting out. Unfortunately here in NZ and AUS we are going through test trials and errors..mainly errors. I'm sure they are trying everything they can do :)
Didn't OCE servers come out 2 years ago?
Thank you for having some logic...unlike someone else posting...

sounds about right :) they just don't have the resources or the workers in the OCE office to provide. Which is a shame. It will take a while before the OCE server be at its best capability (hopefully a new client) i'm guessing to that each server has their own money allocation for upkeep? maybe OCE lacks funds because of the lack of players on this server?...many questions unanswered but all we can do is wait. Which sucks monkeyballs lol
Correct.
Thank you Rainbow for your comment...

Well it is, OCE isn't high priority with it's small players. We don't always get Twisted Treeline, it is set on a routine unlike other servers with it up all the time. We also do not get 3v3 ranked, Dominion and Draft mode normals unlike other servers. That is because of queues and etc which I can link you threads that will explain it all. In conclusion OCE isn't as great a server due to the content we do not have that other servers have.
I'm sure you deem it acceptable that an hour later i'm still stuck on the reconnect button screen, without any recourse what so ever.

There are OCE WoW servers and they have next to zero issues compared to Riot. Try again.

By the way I'm still stuck on reconnect button screen without the ability to do anything other than close the client and repeat the process. This has been 45 minutes now.
But i'm sure you deem this as acceptable

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kA8GNr9f,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-04-21T23:25:17.569+0000)
>
> Could be a firewall error, or maybe try restarting your computer and/or internet connection. When this happens I do that and it works.

ive done all that and nothing works.
It is a network issue from the server, you will need to wait until it is fixed before being able to reconnect.

I am absolutely sure, that there has to be at least 1 staff member related to PR at riot who isn't currently engaged in trying to fix the issue - can we get some feedback on what is going on; or how long the issue is estimated to plague the client?
and therefore grief the community
They are currently working on fixing the issue. :)
why is ranked down at  10am isnt it until 8:00am
Because Riot are incompetent

Network operations.

"We've temporarily disabled the RANKED_QUEUE queues while we investigate an issue that's negatively impacting games."

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

Can we stop focusing on cosmetic dumb shi*t like recolor skins and focus on fixing the horrendous client? I have had at least 10 instances in the last 3 days where the client has just crit-errored and I've had to reload for no reason at all other than i'm being forced to play on software first used on the original SIMS

Things happen dude....this isn't even the first time. It isn't about bad service or anything. Regardless the company there are things that go wrong. Just wait it out, it's not that big a deal....I'm sure you can wait a while to play a normal game.
these things happen WAY too often for a market leading company like Riot - and btw I can't play any games BECAUSE IM STUCK ON THIS DUMB RECONNECT SCREEN
If you are really that mad about small issues which EVERY company and leading software has then uninstall League and you will not have problems with things happening "Way too often".

Yeah I better give up doing something I love because the company can't get their shit together. No. I'll continue playing and reserve the right as a consumer to let the company know when they are doing a horrible job.
How about let them know they are doing a horrible job by sending them an email? Also, if you love it then why are you posting negative things about it.
I love the game - I despise the fact the game platform is from 2004
Not really...your own opinion though. lol.
You explain why A billion dollar company is using Adobe Air as their client?
why would rito go to the effort of looking at one guys email when there are probably hundreds

What you just said means they don't read any emails, which they do.

If they look at it that way no emails will be considered. Your comment doesn't make sense....

Currently in Australia there is work being done on Cables.
This could be the industries fault, not riots.
Same thing happened to me around the same time, I still cant connect and when I went on a different account and checked my profile, it have removed lastnights win from my provisional list. WTF???

Not sure if anyone has read this yet...i just copied and paste from a guy who posted the link in this thread

Summoners,

In the early hours this morning a small network maintenance was completed in our continual effort improve stability and performance for everyone. After the change was completed we continued to monitor the situation and noticed some players being disconnected from their games.

As a result we have enabled Loss Prevented and disabled ranked queues while we investigate the issue.

-ToxicHawk
